Experience

On the banks of the mighty Zambezi River, in the heart of the wildlife-rich Lower Zambezi National Park in Zambia, lies the luxurious Chiawa Camp.
This thatched & tented camp boasts a beautiful location from which to enjoy a variety of land & water-based safari activities.

Stay

Chiawa Camp has 8 safari tents & 1 safari suite built on raised wooden decks, each with an en-suite bathroom including a ball-&-claw slipper bath, an indoor & outdoor “waterfall” shower as well as a relaxing day bed on the private veranda. All tents enjoy spectacular views over the Zambezi River.
Each tent is about 100 sq metres & boasts its very own “bench wallow” which in cool weather is a sunken lounge area & in hot weather, a plunge pool on demand that fills after just a couple of minutes at the turn of a tap & empties at the push of a button.
The safari suite redefines the term ‘luxury’ & is perched high above the Zambezi River, offering commanding views. Ideal for honeymooners or families, the suite offers a king bedroom, a lounge (that converts into a second bedroom), an inter-leading bathroom with bath, indoor & outdoor shower, a dining room & lounge with fireplace as well as a 16 sq meter pool.
The communal areas at Chiawa include a lounge & bar as well as a gym & pool both overlooking the Zambezi.

Activities

Chiawa Camp includes a variety of land & water-based activities, including day & night game drives, guided walks, river cruises or canoe safaris to view elephants & hippos as well as thrilling fishing excursions.

subfolders.title: Baines' River Camp
subfolders.description: Baines’ River Camp is set on the northern bank of the mighty Zambezi River in one of Southern Africa’s wildest parks – the game-packed Lower Zambezi National Park. This area in Zambia is rich in wildlife & offers guests an authentic safari experience in a pristine wilderness setting. Named after naturalist & explorer Thomas Baines, the camp hosts a variety of exciting safari activities, including unique safari workshops where guests can learn about photography, bird watching or fly fishing.

subfolders.title: Old Mondoro
subfolders.description: The seasonal Old Mondoro (open from April to November) boasts a beautiful location on the banks of the great Zambezi River, overlooking a maze of hippo-filled channels & small islands in the Lower Zambezi National Park. This ‘back-to-basics’ camp focuses on providing guests with an authentic safari experience with enough comfort, without being side-tracked from the viewing wildlife. Owner-managed & run, Old Mondoro will provide guests with exceptional, personalized service & a high standard of guiding.  The owners are passionate conservationists who are deeply involved with preserving Zambia’s wildlife.

subfolders.title: Royal Zambezi Lodge
subfolders.description: The award-winning Royal Zambezi Lodge is located within a private concession on the banks of the iconic Zambezi River in the world-renowned Lower Zambezi National Park. The camp offers guests a perfect blend between adventure & luxury while keeping the focus on wildlife. With a stunning riverside location, The Royal Zambezi offers plenty of fun-filled activities, which makes this the ideal destination for both honeymooners & families looking for an amazing safari experience.

subfolders.title: Sausage Tree Camp
subfolders.description: Deep in the heart of the rugged & remote Lower Zambezi National Park, lies Sausage Tree Camp – a luxurious tented camp with beautiful river views. It is not uncommon for elephants & resident hippos to wander through camp as they snack on new leaves, so guests will have ample opportunity for thrilling close-up wildlife encounters. Sausage Tree Camp is, without a doubt, one of Lower Zambezi’s most extravagant camps.  It remains a favourite of honeymooners & couples in search of luxury, seclusion & romance.

subfolders.title: Time & Tide Chongwe Suites
subfolders.description: Time + Tide Chongwe Suites enjoys an ideal location on the banks of the picturesque Chongwe & Zambezi Rivers in Zambia’s Lower Zambezi National Park. Magnificent views over 2 rivers, luxurious suites & exciting safari activities keep guests happy year after year. This exclusive-use villa is ideal for families or small groups looking for a private, luxurious safari experience.
